title: 820-00138 - water damage
message:
Hello!

Water Damaged Motherboard - U3210 was  burnt beyond all recognition.

Is this likley to be repairable ? I think I'll have to run jumper wires / find some way of instaling the C320 again.

Is this requried fopr the computer to work beyond supplying power to thunderbolt?

TBTAPWRSW_ISET_V3P3 etc I assume are thunderbolt settings/

big mess!

title: 820-00138 - water damage
message:
You can remove all Thunderbolt chips.
Also remove power (Q3080).
